title: Meet the Team
tagline: From strategy to execution, our team brings innovation, dedication, and heart to everything we do. Together, we turn ideas into impact.

members.name: Manish Bhanot
members.content: Experienced in building and deploying full-stack web apps using MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js. Skilled in RESTful APIs, scalable front ends, and NoSQL integration. Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, and async programming. Familiar with Agile, DevOps, and Git workflows. Focused on clean code and responsive, user-friendly solutions.

members.name: Meenakshi Kaundal
members.content: Experienced in front-end and back-end skills. Experienced in building responsive web apps using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Angular, Vue.js, Node.js, and Express.js. Proficient in MongoDB, MySQL, RESTful APIs, and AWS deployment. Writes clean, maintainable code and collaborates well in agile teams to deliver user-focused solutions

members.name: Rishve Bhanot
members.content: Experienced in building scalable web apps using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. Proficient in RESTful APIs, Redux, and third-party integrations. Strong in JavaScript, TypeScript, and modern front-end tools. Focused on performance, responsiveness, and delivering quality solutions.
